author: Bryan B
title: Bryan B
text: I was looking for affordable LEDÂ´s on the internet, Bulbs.com showed in the search. after browsing their site and comparing prices with other sites bulbs.com was the best one on price. I placed my order, chose my shipping method, paid, and received my order. I love the bulbs I bought, I tell my friends, family, and my boss if they want bulbs go to bulbs.com good quality, great price. I plane on going back soon.
